item.title: 摩根士丹利聘用前布雷万-霍华德-拉美经济学家卡比埃德斯
item.description: 根据摩根士丹利投资管理公司（Morgan Stanley Investment Management）在 LinkedIn 上的个人资料，该公司已经聘请了伦敦一家对冲基金的前拉丁美洲首席经济学家 Iker Cabiedes。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management has hired Iker Cabiedes, the former Latin America chief economist at a London-based hedge fund, according to his LinkedIn profile.】

item.title: 美国国家橄榄球联盟为何让私募股权投资加入比赛
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（National Football League）是职业体育界最有价值的实体之一，它终于允许机构投资者进入其富豪行列。由于最近的一次投票改变了联盟的规则，私募股权公司现在可以购买 NFL 球队 10% 的股份。虽然这些股份最终都很小，但它们还是允许球队所有者向沉默的合作伙伴出售球队的部分股份。MLB 和 NBA 已经允许类似的安排。【原文：The National Football League, one of the most valuable entities in professional sports, is finally letting institutional investors enter its rich ranks. Thanks to a recent vote that changed the league’s rules, private equity firms will now be able to buy 10% stakes in NFL teams. While these are ultimately small stakes, they nonetheless allow owners to sell pieces of their teams to silent partners. The MLB and NBA already allow similar arrangements.】

item.title: 破产太阳能公司 SunPower 获准向竞争对手出售资产
item.description: 在需求下降和通胀上升迫使这家加利福尼亚太阳能公司于 8 月份破产之后，SunPower 公司周四获准将其资产出售给竞争对手 Complete Solaria 公司。【原文：SunPower Corp. got approval to sell its assets to rival Complete Solaria Inc. on Thursday, after declining demand and rising inflation pushed the California solar firm into bankruptcy in August.】

item.title: 澳大利亚的加密货币自动取款机增长速度全球领先，报刊亭如雨后春笋般涌现
item.description: 比特币自动提款机正源源不断地进入澳大利亚，使该国成为比特币自动提款机增长最快的市场，同时也引发了人们对这种有争议服务的需求来源的质疑。【原文：Bitcoin automatic-teller machines are streaming into Australia, making the country the fastest-growing market for the kiosks and stirring questions about the source of demand for the contentious service.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行、加拿大帝国商业银行因信贷预测改善而拉开与加拿大同行的差距
item.description: 在信贷质量方面，加拿大六大银行中有两家在上一季度成为明显的赢家：加拿大皇家银行和加拿大帝国商业银行。【原文：When it comes to credit quality, two of Canada’s Big Six lenders were clear winners last quarter: Royal Bank of Canada and Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce, which both set aside much less money to cover loan losses than expected, fueling solid earnings beats in the process.】

item.title: 联合国称以色列将允许暂停在加沙接种脊髓灰质炎疫苗
item.description: 一位联合国高级官员说，以色列将允许加沙地带的战斗部分暂停，以便联合国开展脊髓灰质炎疫苗接种活动。【原文：Israel will allow for partial humanitarian pauses in fighting in the Gaza Strip for the United Nations to carry out a vaccination campaign against polio, a senior UN official said.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省人口激增，油价上涨推动盈余增长
item.description: 由于油价高于预期以及人口激增带来了更多的税收，艾伯塔省预计本财政年度结束时的盈余将超过之前的预测。【原文：Alberta expects to end the fiscal year with a larger surplus than it previously forecast as higher-than-expected oil prices and a surging population generate more tax revenue.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行不应过快减息，因为 2% 的目标尚未实现
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，鉴于通胀率尚未持续恢复到 2%，欧洲央行应警惕过快降息。【原文：The European Central Bank should be wary of reducing interest rates too rapidly given inflation hasn’t yet returned sustainably to 2%, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 日本新日铁呼吁对中国钢铁征收贸易关税
item.description: 世界第四大钢铁制造商新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：The Japanese government needs to impose an anti-dumping tariff on Chinese steel exports to protect the domestic industry, said Nippon Steel Corp., the world’s fourth largest steelmaker.】

item.title: NFL 的 "比尔黑手党 "利用市政债务为新体育场融资
item.description: 水牛城比尔队最忠实的球迷被称为 "比尔黑手党"（Bills Mafia），他们以向球队伸出援手而闻名，曾在今年早些时候的一场季后赛中为 NFL 球队的体育场清理积雪。现在，这些球迷有机会购买债券，为球队价值 17 亿美元的新球场提供资金。【原文：Buffalo Bills’ most committed fans, known as Bills Mafia, are known for lending a hand to the team, having cleared snow from the NFL franchise’s stadium for a playoff game earlier this year. Now, these enthusiasts are being offered the chance to buy bonds that will finance the team’s new $1.7 billion stadium.】

item.title: 达成火灾和解后，爱迪生创历史新高
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司（Edison International）的股价创下历史新高，此前这家加州公用事业公司的所有者表示，已与州政府官员达成临时协议，以挽回 2017 年和 2018 年因野火和泥石流造成的近 17 亿美元损失。【原文：Edison International’s shares hit an all-time high after the California utility owner said it has reached a tentative agreement with state officials to recover nearly $1.7 billion in losses from wildfires and mudslides in 2017 and 2018.】

item.title: 天然气流量增加和萨哈林-2 号协议使俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司净收入增加两倍
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom Group）今年上半年的净收入增长了两倍多，这主要得益于管道天然气出口量增加、石油销售强劲以及收购了壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）在萨哈林-2 项目中的前股份。【原文：Gazprom Group more than tripled its net income in the first half of the year thanks to higher pipeline gas exports, robust oil sales and its purchase of Shell Plc’s former stake in the Sakhalin-2 project.】

item.title: 希腊和沙特阿拉伯协调避免油轮灾难
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士称，希腊正在牵头清空并拖走上周在红海遇袭的一艘油轮。【原文：Greece is leading an effort to empty and tow away an oil tanker that was attacked last week in the Red Sea, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 克罗格称 Albertsons 投资者将交换至少 92% 的债券
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger Co.）表示，该公司正在将至少 68 亿美元的 Albertsons 公司票据换成新证券，约占其本月早些时候提出交换的证券的 92%。【原文：Kroger Co. said that it is swapping at least $6.8 billion of Albertsons Cos. notes for new securities, representing about 92% of the securities it offered to exchange earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续两周下降，降至 6.35
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第二周下降。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US fell for a second straight week.】

item.title: 里约、比亚迪是埃纳米公司在智利的潜在合作伙伴之一
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）和比亚迪股份有限公司（BYD Co. Ltd.）被选为在智利开发锂资产的潜在合作伙伴，这是在价格下滑的情况下开发更多世界上储量最大的电池金属的努力的一部分。【原文：Rio Tinto Group and BYD Co. were selected among prospective partners to develop lithium assets in Chile as part of efforts to tap more of the world’s biggest reserves of the battery metal despite slumping prices.】

item.title: 千禧年以 10 亿美元支持瓦尔兹拉特夫的科技对冲基金
item.description: Val Zlatev 的 Analog Century Management 赢得了千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）的支持，成为从这家多行政对冲基金巨头获得资金的一系列外部投资公司中的一员。【原文：Val Zlatev’s Analog Century Management has won backing from Millennium Management, joining a string of external investment firms to get capital from the multistrategy hedge fund titan.】

item.title: 梅奥称，银行股已准备好在利率和软着陆背景下起飞
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）分析师迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）认为，随着美联储准备降低利率，美国经济几乎没有衰退迹象，银行股将迎来强劲反弹。【原文：With the Federal Reserve preparing to reduce interest rates and the US economy showing few signs of a recession, banks stocks are set up for a strong rally, according to Wells Fargo & Co. analyst Mike Mayo.】

item.title: 埃及签署石油价格波动对冲协议
item.description: 埃及总理穆斯塔法-马德布利（Mostafa Madbouly）在一次新闻发布会上说，埃及签署了大量石油产品价格波动对冲合同。【原文：Egypt signed contracts to hedge against price fluctuations for a large number of petroleum products, Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly said at a news conference.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉离岸汇率因套利头寸解除而跳涨
item.description: 在土耳其里拉持续下跌的情况下，交易商退出了所谓的套利头寸，因此在长周末前的周四，离岸市场隔夜拆借土耳其里拉的成本大幅上升。【原文：The cost of borrowing Turkish liras overnight in the offshore market jumped on Thursday before a long weekend as traders exited so-called carry positions amid a steady decline in the currency.】

item.title: 航空公司所有者阿布拉接近与城堡湖达成 13 亿美元贷款协议
item.description: 濒临破产的巴西航空公司 Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA 的最大股东即将达成一项协议，从投资公司 Castlelake LP 募集 13 亿美元资金，以避免其债券违约的风险。【原文：The largest shareholder of ailing Brazilian airline Gol Linhas Aereas Inteligentes SA is nearing a deal to raise $1.3 billion of funds from investment firm Castlelake LP to stave off the risk of defaulting on its bonds.】

item.title: 先买后付胜过私募基金卖家的大幅折扣
item.description: 希望出售私募基金股份的投资者让买家推迟几个月付款，而不是接受大幅折价。【原文：Investors looking to offload their stakes in private funds are letting buyers push back their payments by months rather than accept a big discount on the price.】

item.title: 赞比亚计划由国营公司拥有 30% 的关键矿产开采权
item.description: 赞比亚计划成立一家投资公司，该公司将控制未来矿山至少 30% 的重要矿物产量。【原文：Zambia plans to establish an investment company that will control at least 30% of critical minerals production from future mines.】

item.title: 美国签署在加纳建造小型模块化核电站的协议
item.description: 美国已同意帮助加纳建设首个小型模块化反应堆项目，以推动核技术成为非洲国家的清洁能源选择。【原文：The US has agreed to help build Ghana’s first small modular reactor project in a push to promote nuclear technology as a cleaner energy option for African countries.】

item.title: 法国高风险债务吸引看淡政治乱局的买家
item.description: 在经历了三个月的动荡之后，一小部分投资者开始抢购法国债务，而大多数基金则被拒之门外。【原文：A very small band of investors is starting to snap up French debt after three months of volatility turned off most funds.】

item.title: 壳牌将削减部分油气部门 20% 的工作岗位
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）首席执行官瓦埃勒-萨万（Wael Sawan）致力于提高效率和盈利能力，因此将裁减部分油气勘探与开发部门约 20% 的员工。【原文：Shell Plc is set to cut around 20% of its workforce in some oil and gas exploration and development divisions as Chief Executive Officer Wael Sawan works to boost efficiency and profitability.】

item.title: 利比亚石油停产加剧，五个码头停止装货
item.description: 利比亚暂停了东部五个港口的石油出口，在谁控制中央银行的僵局不断升级的情况下，该国的石油产量进一步下降。【原文：Libya suspended oil exports from five eastern ports, and the country’s output dipped further amid an escalating stalemate over who controls the central bank.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州官员因针对华尔街的反电子政务集团法遭到起诉
item.description: 美国可持续商业理事会起诉得克萨斯州官员，试图阻止一项因某些金融公司的能源政策而限制该州对其投资的法律。【原文：The American Sustainable Business Council sued Texas officials in an effort to block a law that restricts state investments with certain financial firms because of their energy policies.】

item.title: 银行贷款谈判陷入僵局，加纳将增加可可现货销售
item.description: 加纳官员说，加纳寻求增加可可的现货销售，因为它预计筹集到的资金不到下一个作物季节所需资金 15 亿美元目标的一半。【原文：Ghana seeks to increase spot sales of cocoa because it expects to raise less than half of its $1.5 billion target to fund the next crop season, officials said.】
